title: Ticket #6416: condor_config_val -expand has unexpected new behavior
description:
In versions of HTCondor prior to 8.7.2 condor_config_val -expand foo behaved the same as condor_config_val foo. In these older versions -expand only modified the output when used with -dump. In 8.7.2 that was changed so that -expand would expand foo as if it were a config statement (i.e not lookup and expand, but just expand). This is arguably consistent with the way it modified -dump, but it turns out to be surprising to users.

For 8.7.4 that expansion functionality will be moved to a new condor_config_val option: condor_config -macro, and -expand will revert to it's pre 8.7.2 behavior.
